channel.title: AI on read-trung.md
channel.description: Recent content in AI on read-trung.md

item.title: Evolution over Revolution
item.description: The main reason for this post is that I want to encourage myself to express my ideas and write more often. I thought about the idea of iteration and gradual improvement. Then suddenly the topic of AI came and merged into my thinking. I decided to write a letter to myself based on what I was thinking about. " Hey there, it’s me from the future. You won’t believe how much things have changed since you started using AI services to create value quickly.
